text: Aur zamin mein mukhtalif tukray aik doosray say lagtay lagatay hain aur angooron kay baghaat hain aur khet hain aur khujooron kay darakht hain shaakh daar aur baaz aisay hain jo bey shaakh hain sab aik hi pani pilaye jatay hain. Phir bhi hum aik ko aik per phalon mein bartari detay hain iss mein aql madon kay liye boht si nishaniyan hain
